verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> he spake <S%G3004><s%> a <S%G4314><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> to the end that <S%G4314><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to faint <S%G1573><s%>;

saying <S%G3004><s%>, There was <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> a judge <S%G2923><s%>, who <S%G5100><s%> feared <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> regarded <S%G1788><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G444><s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a widow <S%G5503><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> she came <S%G2064><s%> oft unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Avenge <S%G1556><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> of <S%G575><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> adversary <S%G476><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> a <S%G5023><s%> while <S%G5550><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> afterward <S%G3326><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> Though <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5399><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> God <S%G2532><s%>, nor <S%G3756><s%> regard <S%G1788><s%> man <S%G444><s%>;

yet <S%G1065><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> widow5503, 3930 troubleth <S%G2873><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, I will avenge <S%G1556><s%> her <S%G2443><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> she wear <S%G5299><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> out by <S%G1519><s%> her <S%G2064><s%> continual <S%G5056><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the unrighteous <S%G93><s%> judge <S%G2923><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> shall <S%G1557><s%> not <S%G3364><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> avenge <S%G1557><s%> his <S%G846><s%> elect <S%G1588><s%>, that <S%G3588><s%> cry <S%G994><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>, and yet <S%G2532><s%> he is longsuffering <S%G3114><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>?

I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> he will <S%G4160><s%> avenge <S%G1557><s%> them846, 1722 speedily <S%G5034><s%>. Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%>, when the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> cometh <S%G2064><s%>, shall <S%G687><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he spake <S%G2036><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> trusted <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they were <S%G1526><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> set all others <S%G3062><s%> at nought <S%G1848><s%>:

Two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G444><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%>; the one <S%G1520><s%> a Pharisee <S%G5330><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the other <S%G2087><s%> a publican <S%G5057><s%>.

The Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%>, I thank <S%G2168><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, extortioners <S%G727><s%>, unjust <S%G94><s%>, adulterers <S%G3432><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> publican <S%G5057><s%>.
I fast <S%G3522><s%> twice <S%G1364><s%> in the week <S%G4521><s%>; I give tithes <S%G586><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> I get <S%G2932><s%>.

But <S%G2532><s%> the publican <S%G5057><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> afar off <S%G3113><s%>, would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lift up <S%G1869><s%> so much as <S%G3761><s%> his eyes <S%G3788><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> smote5180, 1519 his <S%G846><s%> breast <S%G4738><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%>, be thou merciful <S%G2433><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a sinner <S%G268><s%>.

I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, This man <S%G3778><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> rather than <S%G2228><s%> the other <S%G1565><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> every one <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> exalteth <S%G5312><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be humbled <S%G5013><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G3588><s%> humbleth <S%G5013><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> shall be exalted <S%G5312><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they were bringing <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> their babes <S%G1025><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should touch <S%G680><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: but when <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> it <S%G2008><s%>, they rebuked them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto him <S%G2036><s%>, saying, Suffer <S%G863><s%> the little children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> to such <S%G5108><s%> belongeth <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G1209><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a little child <S%G3813><s%>, he shall <S%G1525><s%> in <S%G3756><s%> no wise <S%G3364><s%> enter1525, 1519 therein <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> ruler <S%G758><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Good <S%G18><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2816><s%>?
And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? none is good, save one, even God.

Thou knowest <S%G1492><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%>, Do <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, Do <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%>, Do <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, Do <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%>, Honor <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and2532, 4675 mother <S%G3384><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things have I observed <S%G5442><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> youth up <S%G3503><s%>.

And when <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it <S%G2036><s%>, he said unto him <S%G846><s%>, One thing <S%G5023><s%> thou <S%G4671><s%> lackest <S%G3007><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%>: sell <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3745><s%> thou <S%G4671><s%> hast <S%G2192><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> distribute <S%G1239><s%> unto the poor <S%G4434><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%>, follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

But when <S%G1161><s%> he heard <S%G191><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, he became <S%G1096><s%> exceeding sorrowful <S%G4036><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> he was <S%G1096><s%> very <S%G4970><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> easier for <S%G2123><s%> a camel <S%G2574><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> in through <S%G1223><s%> a needle <S%G4476><s%>'s eye <S%G5168><s%>, than for <S%G2228><s%> a rich man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, The things which <S%G3588><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> impossible <S%G102><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are possible <S%G1415><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Lo <S%G2400><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> have left <S%G863><s%> our own <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>.

who <S%G3739><s%> shall618, 3756 not <S%G3361><s%> receive <S%G618><s%> manifold more <S%G4179><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G165><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he took <S%G3880><s%> unto him the twelve <S%G1427><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, we go up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all the things <S%G3956><s%> that are <S%G3588><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> shall be accomplished <S%G5055><s%> unto the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> up unto the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall be mocked <S%G1702><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shamefully treated <S%G5195><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> spit upon <S%G1716><s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> they shall scourge <S%G3146><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise again <S%G450><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G846><s%> understood <S%G4920><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of these things <S%G5130><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> saying <S%G4487><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> hid <S%G2928><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G2532><s%>, and they <S%G1097><s%> perceived not <S%G3756><s%> the things that <S%G3588><s%> were said <S%G3004><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, as <S%G1722><s%> he <S%G846><s%> drew nigh <S%G1448><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Jericho <S%G2410><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> blind man <S%G5185><s%> sat <S%G2521><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%> begging <S%G4319><s%>:
and <S%G1161><s%> hearing <S%G191><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%> going by <S%G1279><s%>, he inquired <S%G4441><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> meant <S%G1498><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%> passeth by <S%G3928><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he cried <S%G994><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they that <S%G3588><s%> went before <S%G4254><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should hold <S%G4623><s%> his <S%G846><s%> peace <S%G4623><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> he cried <S%G2896><s%> out the more <S%G3123><s%> a great deal <S%G4183><s%>, Thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me <S%G3165><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%>, and commanded <S%G2753><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to be brought <S%G71><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: and when <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was come near <S%G1448><s%>, he asked <S%G1905><s%> him <S%G846><s%>,

<S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> wilt thou <S%G2309><s%> that I should do <S%G4160><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may receive my sight <S%G308><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Receive thy sight <S%G308><s%>; thy <S%G4675><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> hath made thee <S%G4571><s%> whole <S%G4982><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> he received his sight <S%G308><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, glorifying <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, when they saw <S%G1492><s%> it <S%G1325><s%>, gave praise <S%G136><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>.
